miniGames.name: Forest Math Challenge
miniGames.description: Test your math skills in this fun forest-themed challenge!

questions.text: If there are 5 trees in the forest, and each tree has 3 magical fruits, how many magical fruits are there in total?
questions.hint: Multiply the number of trees by the number of fruits on each tree

questions.text: A magical squirrel collects 24 acorns. If it shares them equally among 6 squirrel friends, how many acorns does each friend get?
questions.hint: Divide the total number of acorns by the number of friends

questions.text: If a magical path is 30 meters long and a fairy travels 6 meters every minute, how many minutes will it take the fairy to travel the entire path?
questions.hint: Divide the total distance by the speed

miniGames.name: Castle Knowledge Quest
miniGames.description: Test your knowledge about medieval castles in this exciting quest!

questions.text: What is the name of the deep water-filled ditch that often surrounds a castle?
questions.hint: This defensive feature uses water to stop enemies from approaching the castle walls

questions.text: Which room in a castle was typically used for feasts and important meetings?
questions.hint: This large room was the center of castle life

questions.text: What is the purpose of a castle's keep?

choices.text: To serve as the primary residence and last line of defense

questions.hint: This was the strongest and most secure part of the castle
